title: How do I run the repair in the launcher?
body: I'm trying to backup my item sets but I need to run the repair in the launcher but I don't know how. May you tell me how to do it?

replies.body: I have the feeling I am going to have to repair the launcher too. How do I back up the builds?

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752904-Item-Sets#h4

Scroll down for how to do it on mac.

Hey MLGKervvy,

I can help you with that question. On the top right corner of the patcher, you'll see a "?" After clicking it, you will have an option to "Repair" the game client. Alternatively, the instructions can also be found here:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues#wq6

I'm confused, whats the patcher? I'm new to League of Legends so I don't know that much.

EDIT: Never mind I figured out what the patcher is, but I can't open it up because of this Bug Splat thing, mind telling me how to fix that too? I'm also getting this http://prntscr.com/9401q9

League of Legends really isn't working...

Hey MLGKervvy,

Are you running the client as an administrator? Try using this guide to access the repair feature [[**Repairing Your Client**](http://www.wrenchmen.org/resources/knowledgebase/1?view=article)].
I'm running the desktop shortcut as an administrator. I'm also getting this http://prntscr.com/9401q9 on the first step of the guide you gave me. Is there a way to stop that from opening up?

Son Golin, I am having a major game problem that maybe you could help me with, and before you says submit posts and tickets I already have, but it took the support staff 2 months to just unhack my brothers account when only the password was changed, if you can help me I will explain my problem to you, cant exactly do much else right now anyway.
Thank you,
Hydraneous

Hey Hydraneous,

The best thing to do is to just submit a ticket and hang tight for a response. Generally, if there's no investigation needed, they get back to everyone in a pretty reasonable amount of time.
